index.infoSection:
### By students, for students. Free & Open Source.
The #1 productivity tool for students at TU Dresden.


Find out more about the project on this site and install TUfast now!

content: ## About the project

For two years, we have been creating the perfect product to make your everyday study life easier. TUfast was released in May 2020 and has more than 2700 students using it as of 01.10.2022. The open-source project is developed by students at TU Dresden.
### What does TUfast do? üöÄ
TUfast is a productivity tool, which supports students in their everyday life. With TUfast you can save up to 2000 Clicks and 90 minutes per semester!
To do this, TUfast provides a number of features to make your everyday studies easier, such as:

- AutoLogin to all online platforms
 - Quick-access and hotkeys for many platforms
 - Supports SELMA, OPAL, jExam and many more
 - Overview of all your OPAL-courses as well as improvements for OPAL itself.
 - ... and many more that you can discover in TUfast ;)
### Is TUfast secure? üîê

The TUfast extension stores user data only locally on your device. If you uninstall the extension, all data will be deleted as well. Additionally, TUfast is currently being audited by the department of IT security of TU Dresden. Here you can find our [privacy policy](/datenschutz).
### Whats next? üîÆ
We want to make TUfast available for 5000+ students at TU Dresden and for at least one more university in Saxony.
### Supporters ‚ù§Ô∏è
Supporters of the project:

- Ms. Jantos, the eLearning coordinator of TU Dresden
 - The [DigitalAcceleratorProgramm](https://www.stifterverband.org/digitalchangemaker-accelerator) of the Stifterverband
 - Exhibition of the Faculty of Computer Science at TU Dresden: [output-dd.de](https://output-dd.de/blog/project-post/tufast-tu-dresden-2/)
 - Kind sponsors on [BuyMeACoffee](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/olihausdoerfer)
- Student councils

active.name: Daniel Kluge
active.studies: Dipl.-Ing. Information Systems Engineering, TU Dresden

content: ## Jobs
**The best thing about TUfast?** Software development in real-life for more than 3000 students.

**Are you interested?** Write us an e-mail at [frage@tu-fast.de](mailto:frage@tu-fast.de) answering the following two questions: 1.) What are your most important principles in software development? 2.) Which part of the project would you like to work on? We will answer every mail within 5 days.
After one year of membership, you can receive a certificate for your contributions and involvement in the project.
### Do I need to be able to write software to participate?

If you want to contribute to our software directly, previous experience with git and web technologies is useful. However, our tech stack is not complicated and we can accomodate rookies. Besides, we have tasks in project management and marketing.
### Working areas
Below we listed some ideas we would like to develop. However, we are counting on your ideas and vision for the project!

listings.title: TUfast for Safari
listings.content:
We get many requests that TUfast should also support Safari. You have experience with developing for macOS/Safari? Then do your fellow students a favor and take over the implementation! 

 Learnings: Distribution of web extensions, web development, macOS/Safari

listings.title: TUfast for mobile
listings.content:
Service-Workers are the latest trend in web technologies - that's why we want to use them. This will enable us to make TUfast available for mobile devices and to add many new features. 

 Learnings: Mobile optimization, service workers

listings.title: TUfast for HTW (and other Universities)
listings.content:
TUfast is great - students at the HTW also noticed that. Therefore, we would like to make TUfast available for HTW as well. This includes: Designing a software concept to integrate more universities and implementing it for HTW. 

 Learning: Software design, web development, user oriented services

listings.title: IT Security
listings.content:
You are interested in IT-Security? Perfect! We are looking for someone who looks into the security aspects of TUfast. We already got feedback and a scrutiny from the Informationssicherheit TU Dresden. In the future, we would like to evaluate security internally and implement measures accordingly. 

 Learnings: IT security, Websecurity, Webdevelopment

listings.title: TUfast Telemetry
listings.content:
We would like to collect anonymous usage data for TUfast to make the service even better. This data should be published on our website as well. Possible tools include Clickhouse or OpenTelemetry. 

 Learnings: Product telemetry, back-end design and implementation

listings.title: Marketing
listings.content:
We value marketing as a huge part of our project. Our goal is, to develop a clear brand communication and distribute TUfast to as many users as possible. You want to gather experience in marketing and brand communication? Then this is the perfect spot for you! 

 Learnings: Design, brand communication, project responsibility

listings.title: Project management
listings.content:
A team is only as good as its shared vision. In project management, you make sure that this vision is communicated and achieved. This includes looking for project sponsors, communication to project stake-holders and general project management. 

 Learnings: Project responsibility, leading, handling stake-holders
